source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a grand, illuminated building in a city at night. The long exposure captures the movement of traffic, which appears as vibrant streaks of red and white light flowing through the streets. The static architecture stands in stark contrast to the blurred motion of the city life around it.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a grand, illuminated building in a city at night. The long exposure captures the movement of traffic, which appears as vibrant streaks of red and white light flowing through the streets. The static architecture stands in stark contrast to the blurred motion of the city life around it.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several people are seen walking up the steps in front of the building, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a time-lapse video of a grand, illuminated building in a city at night. The long exposure captures the movement of traffic, which appears as vibrant streaks of red and white light flowing through the streets. Several people are seen walking up the steps in front of the building, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The static architecture stands in stark contrast to the blurred motion of the city life around it.
